[size=4][color=khaki][b]Has everything you need for a safe and secure Internet experience

The Kaspersky Internet Security application was designed to be a all-in-one security solution that offers a worry-free computing environment for you and your family. Kaspersky Internet Security has everything you need for a safe and secure Internet experience.

Here are some key features of "Kaspersky Internet Security":

Essential Protection:
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Protects from viruses, Trojans and worms
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Blocks spyware and adware
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Scans files in real time (on access) and on demand
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Scans email messages (regardless of email client)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Scans Internet traffic (regardless of browser)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Protects instant messengers (ICQ, MSN)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Provides proactive protection from unknown threats
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Scans Java and Visual Basic scripts

Extended Protection:
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Two-way personal firewall
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Safe Wi-Fi and VPN connections
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Intrusion prevention system
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Intelligent application management and control
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· automatically configured application rules
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· security rating is assigned to unknown applications
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· access to the userÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s resources and data is restricted for unknown applications

Preventive Protection:
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Scans operating system and installed applications for vulnerabilities
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Analyzes and closes Internet Explorer vulnerabilities
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Disables links to malware sites
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Detects viruses based on the packers used to compress code
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Global threat monitoring (Kaspersky Security Network)

Advanced Protection & Recovery:
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· The program can be installed on infected computers
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Self-protection from being disabled or stopped
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Restores correct system settings after removing malicious software
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Tools for creating a rescue disk

Data & Identity Theft Protection:
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Disables links to fake (phishing) websites
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Blocks all types of keyloggers
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Virtual keyboard is provided for safely entering logins and passwords
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Prevents the theft of data exchanged via secure connections (HTTPS / SSL)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Blocks unauthorized dial-up connections
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Cleans up any traces of user activity (deletes temporary files, cookies etc.)

Content Filtering:
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Parental control
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Improved antispam protection (plugins for Microsoft Outlook, Microsoft Outlook Express, The Bat!, Thunderbird)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Blocks banners on web pages

Usability:
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Automatic configuration during installation
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Wizards for common tasks
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Visual reports with charts and diagrams
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Alerts provide all the information necessary for informed user decisions
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Automatic or interactive mode
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Round-the-clock technical support
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Automatic database updates

Requirements:

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Intel Pentium 300 MHz or higher (or equivalent)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· 256 MB available RAM
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· 50 MB free space on the hard drive
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· CD-ROM (for installation of the program from CD)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· computer mouse
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Internet connection (for product activation)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 or higher (for downloading updates)
